content.detailedDescription: I was driving west along the turnpike and saw what at first appeared to be two stars. as i watched, i noticed that they moved slightly, and always with each other. i also noticed that there appeared to be a cigar shaped mass between them. i stopped to observe more closely, and saw them very distinctly move to the right. (north) as an airplane passed from the south. by this time i had awakened my codriver, who remembered witnessing something similar once before. we drove on, keeping sight of the object until it finally disappeared behind the mountains. during this time i drove approximately 75 miles and the object never got noticeably closer or farther away.
content.summary: Object nearly stationary in sky as we drove approx 75 miles of pennsylvania turnpike - evaded nearby airplane

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dogs and i notice two large red pulsating lights coming toward my location. they were moving about 10mph. i put the dogs in the house and grabbed my cell phone to take a picture. by this time, the lights were less than 500 feet just above my head. the sky was clear and the moon had not come up so it was very dark. i could not see a vessel, just the dark red lights pulsing simultaneously on a diagonal from one another. there was no sound at all. i was not very successful in filming but i did salvage a still from the video that does not depict the lights as i saw them in person, but i was able to see what may have been the craft.
content.summary: Two large pulsating red lights on a diagonal

content.detailedDescription: I was laying out on the beach looking at the stars when one of the stars began to fly mimicking the path of a shooting star. it changed direction drastically and was flying 10 times faster than a plane or jet. as soon as it reached the clouds it disappeared. the aircraft was orange red and in the shape of an orb. this is the third time i have witnessed this type of aircraft. they look like the aircraft depicted in world war 2 used by the germans but the speed is far advanced possibly somehow close to the speed of light.
content.summary: Orange orb flying thru sky much faster than a plane or jet.

content.detailedDescription: Me and some friends were hanging out. i went over to my friends grandparents deck. i noticed it in the sky when i happened to glance over and knew that it wasn't a street light or a known object. i didn't know what it was, i thought it was a ufo right away. it was simalar to a jellyfish, a circle at the top with things dangling from the bottem. i got excited and ran to the backyard of the next house over to get more people. we were on a street with two church's it started over one, passed the house in between them and when it got over top of the other church it slowly disappeared getting smaller and smaller.
content.summary: Looked like a jellyfish, orange red in color, stayed in one spot for a while then went south east stay in one spot then slowly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Last may 24, 2015 , around 9 pm  us eastern time .. i live in canton, ga ... i was carry my travel bags and pack into my car parked at my apt parking lot.. i stood and stand up to my car. look to stars view to sky southwest... i thought it is nice to see full moon or near full moon  has two bright stars   ... one white star near moon.. other white star father than frist star   it  look like " shape of l "   i thought it was
 iss ( international space ship ) .. i was hope see iss to move it  but .. there is no move at all.. happens so few secounds on that farthest part of white star next had quick red flash light with black spot middle of flash... it seems same size of both white star and red flash " star"...  i never seen this in my life time, ever !    wish i had camera to prove it ,,, i was not expecting see this ever in my life or expecting !    after that , i never seen this before !  i was hope find other wintness in this big parking lot .   there is no other witness this odd red light in space.


if you need ask me more info,, contact me..By my phone number.... relay service videophone  so either  you can leave your message into my " answering machine "  so american sign langauge  interpeter  will sign,,,, so i can respond you back when i can.  


hope you can respond write or call ,,,,  i dont know if i am wrong or right  ?


t.B.
canton, ga
content.summary: In space during night time, short few secound red flash....

content.detailedDescription: The star was brighter than the other stars. we were in the country and so there were not lights sources to interfer with the star light, but this one was big. i told my cousins and we all began to look up. my cousins paid some attention then went back to playing, but i continued to look. then four to five smaller stars came out of the large star which was remained stationary and then thess smaller stars became stationary and then smaller stars came out of them. then all of the stars except the main star started zig zagging around the big star like maybe if you had a large glass jar with bb's in it and you started shaking it as fast as you could, but one that was not a bb or a marble but a ping pong ball remained suspended in the middle not moving. i couldn't stop looking. i was mesmerized. we went in to get our parents but they were taling and sent us back out. later my cousins left an i went to bed. that week during bed time, my bed is right next to the window. i had an urge to look out. i say a face, angular, it looked like flakes where on it. it had yellow or green eyes. i jumped out of bed and ran out of the room to my parents. that same year until i started experiencing obe's. first i would hear a tone in my ear like a persistent note. i would focus on the sound and my brain would fell like it was vibrating faster and faster until  there was an explosion of light and then i was over my body and i could will myself to go where i wanted in the house and did. i also was able to see events in different locations miles and miles away in a trance like state, which often siezed me nightly. i could see and hear every thing but could not move. i say my fathers car plung into a river and the police and emergency vihicles, at the same time i say my mother scream out and arise from the bed hearing the radio of the wreck. all three events were tens of miles from each other. my uncle and mother are still alive and remember this, although i don't know if this started that night, because when i was an infant in a crib at my grandmothers house, may 5 or 6 months, i had a fever and i was above my body. i remember the conversation my mother and grandmother spoke to each other. when i told this to my mother for the first time when i was in my twenties she was stunned. my mother and i have a special communication between us. we call each other out of intuition or she will speak to me in a dream to contact her, sometimes she is in the form of someone in my immmediate environment. one time she was my college dean who came to my seat in a vision and said you need to call your mother. when my mother and i speak in instance such as these we do not even mention the means of contact. i also have premonitions of upcoming events. anyway i am glad your organization exist.
content.summary: Late night on the farm playing tag with cousins, looked in the sky say very large star

content.detailedDescription: The ufo appeared at a close distance to us not a far away object. i would describe the ufo as cloud like at one with nature however it clearly emitted light and sound. the ufo hovered close by overhead at what seemed cloud distance moved slowly a short distance then made a jet like sound and disappeared in thin air..
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Playing in back yard with friend at night and both saw the ufo fly over us at a low hight than disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq with witness on phone by fi l.F. 7/2/2015
________________________________________________________________________
two years ago on april 19th, 2013, 9:15 pm, 
i was outside smoking when i saw a red star over the ocean coming from the south west,coming closer and getting larger and coming closer. i got a good look at it when it flew by, it made no noise. it was a giant black triangle, larger than a 747. it had very bright red lights on the bottom and around the edges and on the back. i could see inside and saw three inities, all with large heads, they had torsos and arms, humanoid. the two in the back seemed to be at a control panel and the one in the front was looking out the windows. the interior was illuminated red because i could see in the four large windows. it seemed to come from newport beach area and as i watched it fly by it flew in the direction of the north east towards yorba linda. i watched it for 5 minutes until i couldn't see it anymore. someone else must have seen this also.
content.summary: I was outside smoking when i saw a red star over the ocean coming closer and getting larger

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my balcony at my apartment watching the stars, sober if i might add. as i was watching the stars i had noticed two bright c shaped lights one red and one white and the lights were flashing on and off it looked like the lights were possibly rotating. the craft hovered above me a little over a mile into the sky for about 15 to 30 seconds, it then proceeded to hover in a figure 8 pattern not moving up or down, after about 30 more seconds of odd figure 8 patterns the craft shot off into the night sky and it was as if it had evaporated and disappeared. this is not the only sighting i have witnessed but it is one of the most prominent in my memories and the most apparent to be non human. it had to be other worldly, this i strongly believe.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright flashing lights hovered quickly in a figure 8 and shot off into sky disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
Written with the witness over the phone at mufon hq by fi l.F.
__________________________________________________________________________
in the summer of 1995/96, while out side smoking, i saw 4 to 5 cigar shaped spheres hovering in  the sky.
they were blue green and hovering at 1500 feet from the ground. they made no noise and were in the eastern sky. i went inside and got my wife and she saw them also. we also saw it reported in the paper the next day.
we could watch the space shuttles being launched from our backyard, so we were used to looking up in the sky.

my second sighting was in the same area two years later, in the evening, in the winter. i saw a very bright orange colored burning on fire "caboose shaped" rectangle flying through the sky towards the east. it appeared to crash, but we heard no noise. it made a low humming noise like a slow vacuum cleaner when it went by. there is a small airfield in that area, but not sure what i saw.
content.summary: While out side smoking i saw 4 to 5 cigar shaped spheres hovering in  the sky

content.detailedDescription: My story begins when i was coming home at around 422 i was home about to open the door to my house and i looked up in the sky and saw a ufo. a white orb flying way above my house. it was white small and i did not have tome to take a pic or film it it just disappeared into thin air. it is the first time i ever see this! i knew in my heart that this thing was not something that we know of. it is either some black budget craft or its a craft from another planet or dimension. it seemed something that was not normal in the sky!
content.summary: Ufo orb

content.detailedDescription:
It was very late at night.  we were in formation in the center of the quad between all of the barracks for all of the different military branches.  i don't remember why we had such a late formation.  i think it may have been a holiday leave final check out, which would place this in december instead of march.

we all watched several lights of different colors manifest over the quad, descend, hover over us, change direction, then ascend and vanish.  the lights appeared to be attached to a very large object.  it was close enough that i thought that i could make out a textured metal, boxy, exterior on one small part, the rest was lost in shadow.

the way that it turned, hovered, and maneuvered was not like any military, or civilian, craft that i am aware of.  the placement of the lights was unlike any object i have ever seen.  there were at least 20 people present who all saw the same thing, and there was no sound.  very large engines would be required for an object of that size to hover, change directions, and move slowly without crashing.

we assumed it was classified military aircraft, and didn't say anything to anyone.  also, strange lights in the sky were a frequent thing at ft. huachuca.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange box/rectangular type object above the quad at the enlisted military intelligence barracks at ft. huachuca

content.detailedDescription:
This was a sustained phenomenon that occurred for about a year, off and on, between 1999 and 2000 above the bachelor enlisted quarters of the us army intelligence school.

in the mornings, we would form up behind the barracks, in the quad, and do physical training (pt).  on many mornings, when we looked into the sky as the sun was rising, we could see objects very high up that would reflect the light of the sun along certain parts of their path.  when they were in the dark part of the sky, they were invisible, when they were near the rising sun, they were visible.  on some mornings we counted dozens of them.

we got the best views when they would fly too close to the barely rising sun.  we could tell that they were seed shaped, and extremely high up in the sky.  at first we thought that they were shooting stars, but they came in and left at all directions, and the sightings were sustained for many months.  we were also able to look closely and see that they did not emit light of their own, but reflected off of the sun.  shortly after sunrise, they would vanish entirely.

we could not see them at night, or in the daytime, but only just as the sun rose.

i made sure that the others present saw the same thing, and they all confirmed that they did.  strange lights in the sky were not uncommon at ft. huachuca.  people observed many strange lights.  we all had top secret clearances though, so we never reported these sightings to anyone but each other out of fear of being declared mentally unfit, which would cause us to lose our clearances.
content.summary: For several months strange lights danced in the sky above fort huachuca army intelligence school

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My family and i went to see the july 1st fireworks (for canada day) in calgary that were scheduled to be between 10:45pm and 11:45pm that day. they were being launched off the centre street bridge in calgary, so we decided to go to the sunnyside bank park and watch the fireworks from the top of the hill to get a good view (on crescent road nw near 2nd street nw). i remember looking at the time on my cell phone and at 10:51pm i made a comment to my wife that they were late with their fireworks. 

within a few minutes of that time the fireworks had started and they lasted approximately 15 minutes. once the fireworks finished, i waited for maybe 30 seconds to see if any more were coming, but all there was now was smoke above the centre street bridge. i looked at my cell phone again and the time was 11:09pm. i made another comment to my wife that they were liars, as i was expecting fireworks to last an hour. she laughed, and shortly after that she asked me "what is that green light up there?"

i looked up in the sky and saw a green stationery star-like object in the sky hovering probably above centre street (not directly above us, just slightly east from us) and it was north of the centre street bridge. i don't know exactly how high it was, but it there was cloud cover and the object was still below the clouds. at that moment when i first saw it, i didn't know what to think, as it was stationery. in my mind i immediately related the light to some of the fireworks from before (although it was hovering and not rising and falling like a firework) or maybe a helicopter with a green light (i didn't hear any helicopter noise either, but the object was very high).

the object hovered in that spot for several seconds (10 to 20 seconds), then suddenly it shot off in the south east direction at a speed that i had never witnessed any airplane do before. it shot off several kilometers in the south east direction within 1 or 2 seconds, the came to a sudden  stop, and it hovered again for several seconds. my heart immediately jumped at that moments, as i suddenly knew that whatever this was, it definitely was not a firework, a helicopter or any other conventional aircraft known to me. 

the light then suddenly vanished, as me and my wife started talking to each other in great excitement about what we just witnessed. the light appeared again, i reached for my cell phone to start recording, but as soon as i had the phone ready, the light vanished again, and we did not see it after that. 

when my wife first noticed the object, it was hovering lower, then it shot up with incredible speed and became stationery, at which point she drew my attention to it. i had missed the first part when it ascended, and i only saw it shoot horizontally across the sky. it was canada day fireworks and there were thousands of people scattered all around to watch the fireworks. 

my wife, my 16 year old son and i all saw the object. the people standing behind us saw the object. since there were thousands of people present, i'm sure that many others saw the object. i hope that many more reports from that evening are filed, as i'm sure there are countless other witnesses to the event. 

it was just a light in the sky and if my wife had not pointed it out to me, i would have missed it. due to that fact, i'm sure that majority of the spectators did not see this light, but those that were looking up in the right direction would have seen it for sure.
content.summary: Saw green star-like object hovering in the sky, then it shot off several kilometers within 1 or 2 seconds, hovered again, then dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out with witness on the phone at mufon hq by fi l.F.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

in the fall of 1995, about 6:30 pm, while i was going to a vfw meeting,  i saw three bright objects falling from the sky. it was raining and there was lighting.
i pulled off the road to follow them, they were bright red in the middle and had green trails on both ends. when the first one hit it exploded, the second and third ones exploded near the ground. the sound was three times louder than the lighting. i went to the area later and handled the debris and it felt lighter than meteor material. the debris is still there and nothing grows there and no wildlife will go there either.
this happened near the twin peaks, two mountains area and debris is still there. i would like someone to check out the debris field and see what it was.
content.summary: In the fall of 1995, about 6:30 pm, while i was going to a vfw meeting,  i saw three bright objects falling from the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I asked my colleague about his photo.
he didn't see this object at all and then he told, was no helicopter or planes around.
just down this object in the photo, we see a turn of road about 6 m. wide and 1015 metrs distans from shooting place.
so object is clearly far and wider then village secondhand road.
my friend did photo shot about 12:00 am. with this coordinates: 40°40'26.59"n  19°32'1.38"e
when i was watching photo at once i recognize the object hovering.
content.summary: My colleague was first time near a possible pyramid we was discussing last month. , i got his photos throw facebook and recognize this flying object.

content.detailedDescription:
First i would like to state that i am a huge believer in ufo/alien  encounters. i lived in phoenix when the famous lights over phoenix occurred and witnessed it first hand and, to me it just looked out of place for the phoenix sky line, my first thought was somebody rented stadium lights to maybe have a bar b q on top of south mountain. "even at the time, i believed in ufo/aliens." but again i didn't and don't think the lights over phoenix were a ufo.
 i was born with a neurological disease nf1, it is a disease that causes tumors to grow on nerves, in 2009, i had a back surgery to remove a tumor. i really liked the neurosurgeon who did the surgery. then in august of 2013, one of the tumors in my leg was diagnosed as a malignant periphrial nerve sheath tumor a.K.A. sarcoma cancer. i had a c.T. scan and an m.R..I done. when i went to the neurosurgeon, "keep in mind, this is a well respected neurosurgeon"
he asked when i had surgery on my left ankle, i told him "ive never had surgery on my left ankle" he started laughing, made me pull down my sock to see if i had a scar, i don't. imaging showed two black screws in my ankle. dont know if they are,what they are,pr where they came from. anyway the neurosurgeon who tried to take as much of the tumor as he could but it was to little to late...I had to get my leg amputated. the oncologist i was referred to also asked about the screws in my ankle after viewing the image. the reason for my history brings me to last night,my encounter.
 i really dont know what time it was, between 130am and maybe 3am. i woke up from a state of sleep where you are just starting to dream. i am wide awake when i wake up, i know 110% i did not dream this. i woke to find a circle on my ceiling above the foot of my bed. it made a chirping noise like a cricket "kinda" accept there were no individual chirps, it was a consant noise. then i find myself trying to willingly elevate, i dont know why but thats what i did. i tried to call my wife who was sleeping on the couch with my son, but my voice wouldn't project the volume i needed it to, so i panicked. it was really very scary at that point, and i dont frighten very easily. after 3 or for minutes it just was gone. i didnt see a flight path it took to leave, it was just gone.
 on most nights, if i get up to use the bathroom i, put my prosthetic leg on. last night after this encounter i used my walker to go to the living room to check on my son and wife. they were fine. i wanted to look out the bedroom window but was hesitant. i was thinking to myself what if i was taken, so i started feeling my face for facial hair to see how much growth there was, there wasnt days worth, so i knew i wasnt taken but not convinced, then i remembered that last night "july 1st" was a full moon" so i was hesitant but i looked out the window to see if it was still a full moon and it was.
    theres a couple more things that may or not be relevant to this story, but i will share if i hear from somebody.
content.summary: Smaller than a frisbee in my room

content.detailedDescription:
Sono uscito in veranda a gettare l'immondezza nel bidone, casualmente ho guardato a sud in direzione del mare (circa 6 km distanza in linea d'aria) quando ho visto un oggetto color rosso acceso, poi 2,3,4,5,6,7...Uno dietro l'altro a perfetta distanza!Rimasi estereffatto e non ebbi da subito la freddezza di prendere la fotocamera anche perchã¨ avevo paura di perdere di vista gli oggetti, volevo godere dello spettacolo.Poi invece corsi dentro e presi la fotocamera e subito ricomparirono gli oggetti, stessa direzione stessi movimenti, stessa distanza, stesso silenzio assoluto!
dapprima sembrava decollassero dal mare, poi tutti a formare un cerchio, poi delle linee rette e uno dietro l' altro sparirono nell'oscuritã  del cielo, nel silenzio piã¹ totale.
rimasi di sasso e non vedevo l'ora di dirlo a mia moglie.
la notte stessa pubblicai alcune foto su facebook ma senza descrivere l'evento, per vedere se qualcuno commentava o meglio ancora avesse visto per poi darmi spiegazioni a riguardo.Timidamente lo dissi a dei parenti stretti, poi piã¹ nulla fino ad oggi.
content.summary: Velocitã  costante e silenziosa, luci vive fino alla totale scomparsa.

content.detailedDescription: My grandmother lived with us in dagsboro, delaware, and had her bedroom on the first floor with big trees outside her window.  she would at times call me into her room to watch objects come down near the trees hovering and changing direction and height abruptly.  they were nondescript silverish craft.  they would drop down near the tops of the trees but move again so quickly and in irregular patterns so that you couldn't see any details.  i remember my grandmother telling me that "people say these are just weather balloons from wallops island, but weather balloons can't move like this."  i've seen pictures of the weather balloons from wallops island, and these objects didn't look anything like that.  this was over 40 years ago so the details are vague, but my memory of watching them with my grandmother is very strong.  not an important sighting, but enough to make me a believer.  just wanted to supplement your extensive files as these sightings were never reported.
content.summary: Multiple routine sightings around same time period

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed. i felt like i was being watched. i turned around and saw a black humanoid like being. i knew it wasn't human. i was terrified at first but then suddenly i heard the words, " we won't hurt you.". it looked at me when i blinked then seemed to phase through the wall. then i saw the craft outside my window and i alnost screamed but i remembered what i heard and i knew i was okay. fir now at least. then the craft in a flash like streak disappeared. i didn't sleep that night until my grandma came in to go to bed. it scared me but at the same time it made me feel at piece.
content.summary: I felt like i was being watched. i turned around and saw a being then the craft

content.detailedDescription: On july 2, 2015 i went shopping for furniture. the store was closed until ten am. i decided to leave. i noticed a wiggly object to the south. it looked like the one i saw the night before, like an extremely bright star. the road was empty and i pulled over to see it. i had pictures from the night before but now i would have one in full daylight. the orb started to make gigantic letters. it would start on a path and change its direction at extreme angles to form the letters. the bright orb made the first set of letters "goalien". since i was able to understand the letters, i decided to take pictures. i took it one step further and videotaped it as it was occurring. then i saw the orb on a different path. on the next row the orb wrote the word "kaboom". goosebumps went up and down my arms. the last row said "7/3". my body finally came to the conclusion that this was a hostile message. i was shaking to think what could happen to dallas, texas and i must act immediately. i was looking for other people as a witness. nobody was looking at the skies. i saw a couple of airplanes fly above me but they didn't seem affected. i waited a few more seconds thinking that this was the end of the message and then i saw the orb create a human face. i gasped and could hardly breathe. the message was intended for us. the orb disappeared. i decided to leave and send my information to mufon.
content.summary: Orb wrote "goalien" then "kaboom" and 7/3 above dallas, texas on july 2, 2015 at 8:25am

content.detailedDescription: My girl friend and i were going out to see the venus and jupiter conjunction on the evening of june 30th 2015 around 9 pm ....We were facing west...North west and we saw the planets we had been looking for ...We decide to try to get a better view by walking to a darker area ..To a local school field just down the street from where i live ...Heading more west ...We got the the school yard.... we couldn't see the planets any more and started to look at the moon  with binoculars...When my friend notice something flying in the night sky headed towards the moon  she pointed it out to me ...It took me a minute to find it and than i saw the lights.... it look like the ship was like out lined and not visible but you could definitely see the lights flashing ....My friend thought she was looking at a triangle shape i definitely saw half circle you could see the light bending in a circle shape...She agreed it look like the body of the ship might have been cloaked we did get a glimpse with the  binoculars ...It didn't cross the moon  and complete disappear under the cloud cover
content.summary: It look like it was cloaked it didn't really show the body...Just lights

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was watching television when it started to act up with static, broken images and loss of sound as if some form of interference. at approximately 8:59 i saw a light as if someone was outside with a flashlight and it caught my attention. at 9:00 pm i walked onto my balcony and looking up at the almost full moon i saw a large craft in the chevron or triangular shape with three lights at each point. it seemed translucent from my vantage point. it seemed to disappear after about 5 seconds or so. ten minutes later at 9:10 pm i felt the urge to go back outside onto the balcony. this very bright and intense light appeared from behind some clouds and came towards me from east to west. at the time there were planes taking off from d/fw airport from north to south which is their flight take-off path and this craft went right across the sky directly in their flight path. it seemed to be low in the sky as it came towards me so i was preparing to hear the sound of a helicopter but there was no sound at all even when it traveled directly in front and above me. the interference continued until about midnight when it completely stopped. i feel that it was the same craft that i saw going and then coming towards me.
content.summary: A bright but translucent craft moving away and then towards me

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my mate was sat on a bench waiting another friend to arrive, i spotted out the corner off my eye and there was a bright small object that appeared to be spinning and hovering flashing the colours off orange,red and yellow as one colour above the trees. we didn't pay that much attention at that moment as we thought it was a chinese lantern, we moved off the bench walked around the corner to another friends and back so there was a good 5minute gap, as we approach the bench i looked above the tree line again and they it was but this time it was slightly moving with the same spinning and light flashing, this continued for a further 2 minutes before the object stated getting bigger and brighter then before. this made the object a lot clear it was a triangular shape almost like a pyramid but too bright to see what the actual object was but before anything else it became small again and shot off towards the town centre. you would imagine it to be over but no a black helicopter in the direction where the object shot off too  was flying over there for 10 minutes before the object came back from that direction came back over the tree line as this helicopter seemed to approach closer the object vanished like a light switch was turned off.

we seen this object again the next day at about half 6 in the afternoon for about 2 minutes above the same tree line with the same colour flashes and the same strange growth in size but this time as it got bigger it shot off into the clouds. this time i attempted to record it on my iphone which had the better half off full battery,it turned off and wouldn't come on for a few minutes after the object vanished 


(different location) there is a sort off hot spot in my area where you can see strange lights and objects at night in the sky many have seen them.

thank you for your time and get back onto my asap.. drew
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: This is not the only sighting!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I was video taping in the north west to capture ufo's on my canon power shot a1000 camera  i set the camera at about 40 to 45 degrees on a try pod i than pointed the camera in the direction of the north west then turn on the camera and set the zoom at 11x than pushed the button to record.
i waited for 5 minuets before turning of the camera then i down loaded the video to my computer and watched it in quick time.
i looked for quick a flash and i saw a huge object on the screen flash in front of me.
i checked the time on the video and wrote it down then moved the video back and forth than i saw the hole thing on the screen.
i was so excited and took a picture of it off the computer screen.
the object was so fast on the film it took three frames from 30 frames a second.
content.summary: Brown and black saucer shape

content.detailedDescription:
In july of 2014 i was up late watching a movie with my family. (we were off work for the summer. both my wife and i teach school now.) it was a perfect night so after the movie i decided to walk out onto our deck just to enjoy the night air.  my wife and son went outside too.  i was setting on our deck while my wife and son were setting on the porch.  i live in an extremely rural area and there are no loud sounds at night.  crickets, owls, etc. are all that are heard. i noticed a glowing "orb" hovering above the tree-line approximately two hundred yards away to my left.  the orb began moving from my left to right while still right above the tree tops.  as the orb came closer to my location i realized that i was not looking at a known object. i would describe the orb as being approximately the size of a basketball and it was yellowish colored with a green tint to it. the object appeared to be emitting a "glow" of energy that made the edges look fuzzy or more like small "tentacles." as the orb continued moving toward my location it did not make any type of sound.  the orb did not "flutter" or move erratic; it was clearly on a distinct, direct path of travel and it was powered by some type of power source.  as the orb came closer to where i was setting (now only "roughly" 120 feet away) i started whispering to my wife and son "come over here and look at this!"  both my wife and son were ignoring me. (they did not see the object because they were setting on the porch, under the roof.) i then said louder, "hey you two, come over here and look at this, this is crazy!"  my wife said what are you talking about?" i then said, "over there, look!"  i then abruptly pointed at the object.  as i pointed, it was as if the orb detected my movement.  the orb abruptly changed it's direction of travel and speed.  the orb immediately went straight upward into the night sky and disappeared into a cloud bank.  as soon as the orb disappeared, the entire night sky lit up like a huge firework and a loud, thundering "boom" sound was heard by all of us.  

i told no one of the incident. however, approximately two months later (around september 2014) i was talking to my brother and he told me of a strange incident that happened to him during the summer also.  according to my brother, he and another man were leaving the woods after a deer scouting trip when an object very much like the one i had observed came up the "hollow" where they were standing.  according to my brother, he said the object continued to travel toward them and the closer it came, the more it descended in flight. my brother stated that he became startled because it looked as if the object was going to literally land on them.  my brother stated that when the object came to within thirty yard or so of them it was as if it detected their presence.  my brother stated that the orb abruptly changed directions and it flew up and away from them at an extremely high rate of speed before disappearing.  

in june 2015 while at work a student was sharing an incident with my wife about what had happened to he and his mother recently. (this student had absolutely no idea about my incident.)  according to the student, he and his mother were "coming back from a baseball game" when he noticed a basketball sized orb that glowed yellowish green following them above the tree-line.  when they slowed to observe the orb, it accelerated it's speed and changed it's path of travel to avoid them.  

my wife told the student "you have got to go tell my husband this."  the student walked down to my classroom and started relaying the encounter to me. (i had students in class at the time.)  after the student shared his account, i told him about what i had observed last summer.  during this time i had another student from my class (17 year old male) raise his hand and state, "mr. kennedy, you are not going to believe this but i had the same thing happen to me this past year."  i then asked the student about his experience and according to the young man he stated that while his father, uncle and himself were out coon hunting this past fall they noticed a yellowish green orb following them as they walked through the woods.  according to the student, the orb continued to follow them from above as it hovered above the treetops.  the student said that the object followed them for well over two miles as they walked through the forest.  the student said that his uncle and father became so unnerved by the object following them that they began to shoot at it with a twelve gauge shotgun.  the student stated that the shotgun had no affect on the orb but it did turn and fly upward into the night sky and away from them after being shot at several times.

these individual encounters/events have all happened within a twenty square mile radius of each other.  three of the four encounters have happened within a five mile square radius of each other.  

my eye witness account did not frighten me, nor did i feel in danger, etc.  according to my brother, he was alarmed and the student stated that his uncle, father and himself were very frightened.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed an orb quietly traveling above the tree tops in a perfectly straight line.  the orb then changed directions, went upward into a cloud bank, disappeared, there was a loud "boom" and the entire night sky lit up.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back to phoenixville when i saw some very bright lights that looked like they would fly directly overhead. i was coming home from from a family party, where, when i was leaving, saw a low flying jetliner out of air-lanes, i thought that plane had probably been cleared for priority landing due to medical emergency. what i saw was no jetliner. this had two very white lights at the tips, and a very large red light in the center, no tail section whatsoever. as it passed directly overhead, could get a good look at the red light, which i estimate to be about the size of a house turning on and off aprox every other second.  i have lived by air approach to philadelphia my whole life and as i have seen over 10 ufos in my life, observe the details of aircraft lights. all jet liners have sharp white lights that blink from behind - this had none. no sound report, and had just heard the sound of a low level jetliner aprox 10 mins earlier. the white lights seemed to be pointing forward, the red one just blinked - it was a huge red light. it flew silently from the west directly to the east. this is the second time i have recently seen a large craft with white and red lights over phoenixville area, the other time being march 19, 2015, where i watched for 1-2 mins as it flew very slowly, other similar reports made in the same time over coatseville pa, other reports of slow flying craft over chester county that night, and a red and white lighted craft over hershey pa the night previous. cannot find any other similar reports in my area for recent june 28 sighting, but 4 nights previous a similar shaped craft sighted over nj with no lights on. this has been a very active year - 4 sightings in one year, two in the past month, 5 sightings in the past 18 months. these triangular shape sightings seem to be concentrated in the 10pm hour. keep looking up!
content.summary: Large silent craft probably triangular with white and red lightson june 28 i saw a large craft over phoenixville pa. i think it was triangular, hard to tell as it had very briight lights in the front. two white in the front corners, and an extremely large

content.detailedDescription: Was outside on bridge in niagara falls. witnessed object above fireworks. it was stationary almost like it was watching canada day fireworks too. took a picture in low light camera app.
content.summary: Ufo during fireworks

content.detailedDescription:
I was in greece, camping for the summer holidays and at that exact time i was having dinner, when the chef shouted "ufos!" then most people in the restaurant left their tables and went to see the ufos. i was one of these people and everybody was extremely amazed and some may have even been frightened. i wasn't as that was my 4th time seeing ufos. however, it was surprising, because there were planes in a close proximity. the objects didn't seem to move away or anything, so i thought that i was looking at venus and some other star which was close to it, so they looked like ufos. but then the objects moved north and continued hovering. by that time, everybody had left the scene and i went to grab my laser which has a very long range. i pointed the laser at the bigger object and shone the green light at it. it looked as if the laser had hit it and at that time, the objects seemed to move slightly up and started pulsating. so technically you can say that i've made contact with ufos, but it wasn't direct! unfortunately, i couldn't take any pictures, because my phone didn't seem to be working then for some strange reason. then they continued  moving nw and faded away and disappeared. then they came back again to the same place they were before. this happened 3 times. in addition to that, you could see these 2 tiny red lights in the sky at the same time as the other 2 lights, moving in different directions and in straight lines and changing direction. i also realized that people in other countries saw the same 2 bright lights in the same day by looking at the recent 20 sightings. such one was in indiana, us.
it was a worldwide phenomena, there were ufos there that night i'm sure of that and i know that they were real, they were not figures of my imagination.
content.summary: 2 lights, one brighter than the other, but also other red lights in area moving strangely.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the phone with either the irs or social security, and couldn't hang up the phone, so i was observing while talking to the person on the phone.  it was difficult to keep focused on my phone conversation, because i wanted to run inside and get my husband (who was sleeping), or get my camera, but i wasn't able to think straight about what to do while on the phone.  

i was in the office, on the driveway side of our house, when i saw the object hovering a few blocks away.  it was at the same level that a helicopter would fly.  i went outside, still holding the phone to take a better look.  i walked down the driveway to the end, and made a note that the saucer was probably just three or so blocks away, hovering.  i made mention to the person on the phone, but they didn't seem that interested and kept discussing my reason for calling them.  

i kept my eyes on it from the office window, after i went back inside.  after i hung up the phone, i went outside to look at it, again, but it now had begun surrounding itself with a cloud.  very quickly, it was disappearing from my view, and now i realized that i should've gotten my camera or woke my husband to come look.  

as the cloud completely surrounded the disc, the cloud began to glow brightly from within the cloud, and then the glow was gone.  the cloud was there for a little while, and then i lost interest and went in the house.  

i honestly cannot give an exact date of when this happened.  it was likely in early 2010.  i know the year was 2010, and since i was discussing things with the irs, it would've likely been before april, but i have no recollection of even the month, at this point.  sorry for that.  

one of the things that was disturbing about this is that it would've been hovering over and near a very busy road, (dixie highway), between 10:15 am and 10:45 am.  also, this was only blocks from the pompano beach airport, where they house the goodyear blimp.  i wondered if anyone else was seeing this craft?  i guess i'll never know.  it was not on the news. i watched the news hoping someone else saw it.  

i felt a need to share this.  i have another report to make of a craft i saw in connecticut, circa 1976.  i suppose i should report that on another website?  it feels good to get these stories off my chest!  thank you!
content.summary: Hat shaped silver disc, hovering for 30 minutes.  cloaked in cloud, brightened and not seen again.
